title: Irelia: The Blade Dancer | Champion Trailer - League of Legends

embed.description: Check out an early, in-game look at the reworked champion, Irelia: The Blade Dancer. Releasing in patch 8.7!

body: as graceful as she is deadly{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
https://uploads.disquscdn.com/images/d1dac6595b081e808b3aae74a9d986a40dd0dc817b8e516f416566f0fcaaec5e.png

Cant wait for Frostbutt Irelia

#Good news, everyone!
https://i.imgur.com/KOayUJX.png?noredirect
And they say Rito is out of touch with the playerbase

>
> #Good news, everyone!

My Discord persona is leaking. Eek!

This is the price of your position; you belong to the mob now.

You have my condolences.

> [{quoted}](name=A Superb Villain,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=wh7zWsdc,comment-id=00050003,timestamp=2018-03-19T17:29:16.625+0000)
>
> #Good news, everyone!
> https://i.imgur.com/KOayUJX.png?noredirect

Rito better deliver the Frost Booty.

At this point, with her main skin i wonder if frostbutt finally met its match!?

I mean...look at that o.o
I predict it will be very frustrating to play against her. I´m kinda scared to play top now.

> [{quoted}](name=Haering,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=wh7zWsdc,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-03-19T16:13:42.086+0000)
>
> I predict it will be very frustrating to play against her. I´m kinda scared to play top now.

Time to main Poppy.
There will be a lot of new ways to reset Irelia's bladesurge, so I don't think Poppy will be as strong a counter as she was before.
It's still a dash which poppy can block. And her.ult makes walls which is also good for poppy.
Yeah but Poppy can only block one dash per enemy with each cast of W.
One W will stop her from resetting it though.
Why? We don't know what the conditions for her resets are yet.
We don't know for sure but I think that sounds like a reasonable guess. Otherwise it would be too difficult to lock her down.
I guess we'll just have to wait and see.
I have a hard time imagining it being more frustrating than current Irelia

I don't know about gameplay, but visually, that's one of the most beautiful kits i've seen! 

Irelia herself is half the reason! with that awesome voice of hers!

and, of course:

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/359368387459153920/425315395738533889/unknown.png

<.<
and by the sound of it riot got her original voive actor to do her voice{{sticker:sg-kiko}}
Swain did not look happy to see her!

https://78.media.tumblr.com/90f33301d147d386b8f1b9391214e88b/tumblr_inline_p5uijrD1tr1u0x14h_540.png
(Courtesy of TUMBLR)

I. Am. Dead. 

Omfg she looks amazing!

The art is lit. The VO is lit. The kit is lit. Everything is on point.

Irelia is looking like she'll be the 1st melee champ I invest time in.
That new ult looks like a successful version of Fiora’s first idea for a reworked ult.
So like Camille ult?
Eyup.

I have a feeling its not going to be a true wall. Rather I feel like walking through it will apply the mark we saw the video and do damage. Using my 900 iq, I predict that the mark will reset her Q if she uses it on the target, and her Q is the dash she had on her old kit that reset on minion kill.(bladesurge is the name right?)
Using my 1 IQ I predict some Dank Nerf Irelia memes
using my 420691337 iq IQ I predict that she will have the ability to auto-attack.

Reading this has raised my IQ, now that I have 2 IQ to rub together I created a brain storm of epic proportions. Sadly before I could get the idea from it the storm flung me into a mailbox and I forgot what my prediction was...
{{sticker:sg-zephyr}}

She looks so stunning. Anything so far about her is just amazing. Artwork. Music. And now gameplay.

I can see why she'd be a pain to play against with all that mobility but visually it's probably the most beautiful-looking kit of the game.

She was litteraly one of my first mains.
I evolved as kinda bad at toplane but maybe she will be the reason to try it again fully !
Yasuo on crack... great...

https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/975750169424728064
 a nice timelapse of her splash art
Everything about this release is absolutely stunning so far. The music, the artwork, model, animations and this vid. Can't wait to see the skins and splashes too.
{{champion:141}}

> [{quoted}](name=Sulghunter,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=wh7zWsdc,comment-id=000c0000,timestamp=2018-03-19T17:46:44.527+0000)
>
> {{champion:141}}

It's weird, I thought I was the only person who really thought he was an anime character rip off and I never said it because maybe it was just in my head.
They explicitly said in his champion insights that he was inspired by anime tropes (well, the Shadow Assassin part, anyway. Rhaast not so much).

Mostly Sasuke, at least from the hair cut anyhow.
Soul Caliber is where Riot got its inspiration for all of the Darkin weapons, I mean, what is {{champion:266}} if not Nightmare from Soul Calibur?

The hair cut's a dead give away.

https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/villains/images/f/f5/Uchiha_sasuke_ms_attakc_alt_by_katakitsu-d66ducb.png/revision/latest?cb=20170927044910

http://www.lol-wallpapers.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/Kayn-by-VeexArt-HD-Wallpaper-Background-Fan-Art-Artwork-League-of-Legends-lol.jpg
I'd been so worried about this rework, but my God does this look amazing. I just hope she's still more of a skirmisher and not an assassin
Too much mobility. Will not be fun to play against for sure.
This is the most shivers I've ever had in 1 minute and 18 seconds holy
Seriously, that "frostbutt" shit was funny at first but now i'm beginning to think everyone that even cares about Irelia is just a horny pervert.

> [{quoted}](name=LightTrack,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=wh7zWsdc,comment-id=0013,timestamp=2018-03-19T17:55:04.407+0000)
>
> Seriously, that "frostbutt" shit was funny at first but now i'm beginning to think everyone that even cares about Irelia is just a horny pervert.

You take video game fictional chracters too seriously.

That is a pretty garbage argument considering the investment League takes.

I'm more disgusted at the shallowness of people. I don't even see discussion about her kit going around just "Where's muh frosbutt skin"

Fucking pathetic. Ofcourse it's infuriating when you have respect towards the devs.

> [{quoted}](name=LightTrack,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=wh7zWsdc,comment-id=001300000000,timestamp=2018-03-19T18:10:33.904+0000)
>
> That is a pretty garbage argument considering the investment League takes.
> 
> I'm more disgusted at the shallowness of people. I don't even see discussion about her kit going around just "Where's muh frosbutt skin"
> 
> Fucking pathetic. Ofcourse it's infuriating when you have respect towards the devs.

Listen social justice warrior, there is not much to say about her kit until we get the full details with the upcoming PBE patch. So you better chill cause you take these things way to seriously.

You don't really get the idea behind a "discussion" do you?

We didn't get a minute long video showcasing her ass. We got a video showcasing her in-game abilities and so far the comments are mainly about her ass.

That's the stupidity.

> [{quoted}](name=LightTrack,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=wh7zWsdc,comment-id=00130000000000000000,timestamp=2018-03-19T18:25:58.778+0000)
>
> You don't really get the idea behind a "discussion" do you?
> 
> We didn't get a minute long video showcasing her ass. We got a video showcasing her in-game abilities and so far the comments are mainly about her ass.
> 
> That's the stupidity.

Right now you had not even contributed anything to the discussion other than complain about how others contributed their part that you dont like. Freaking pathetic.
Frostbutt is a meme, thats why people keep saying it. people also like sexy things and Irelia has a great butt, nothing wrong about that.

It's tasteless at this point. Kind of how the "Do u know de wae" thing lasted barely two weeks.

People are far too simple minded that such a cheap thing is the warping their attention.

Not to mention how Irelia's legs look extremely unnatural together with her waist.
